meanings.def: a game played on a field by two teams of 11 players, with curved sticks and a small hard ball. Teams try to hit the ball into the other team’s goal.
examples: He plays in the college hockey team.
I've started playing hockey with a local club.

meanings.def: a game played on ice, in which players use long sticks to hit a hard rubber disc (called a puck) into the other team’s goal
examples: She plays hockey in the winter.
Every Saturday night people would sit in front of their television sets watching hockey.
